Nappy services 
Nappy laundry services 
deliver freshly laundered 
nappies to your home and 
take away the soiled ones to 
wash each week.
They supply everything you 
need	â€“	wraps,	liners	and	
storage bins. Ask your health 
visitor or check online for 
local services.
Disposable nappies 
Disposable nappies are 
convenient to use and are 
available from supermarkets 
and other retail outlets.
